biotools.summary: CPPsite is a Database of Cell Penetrating Peptides. It contains cell penetrating peptides (CPPs) alongwith their secondary & tertiary structure. This database maintains experimentally validated CPPs (linear & cyclic; modified & non-natural residues) and wide range of cargos (nucleic acids, proteins, nanoparticles, PNA) delivered in cells using these peptides.
